video.title: Plankton Invasion
video.synopsis: Comm. François Medusa puts Tentacle Trio in charge of Operation Global Warming to cover the Earth's surface with water. In 3D on supported devices.

episodes.synopsis: The commando has found a kinetic energy device on the beach: a watch powered by the movements of the wearer. / Commander Medusa gathers his troops.
episodes.title: Operation the Fellowship of Pulpo / Operation Riders of the Lost Dump / Operation Bugs Attack

episodes.synopsis: The HQ is functioning on clean energy. / Star loses one of his tube feet. / The commando organizes a celebration for the great Dependence Day.
episodes.title: Operation Blackout / Operation Star Junior / Operation Dependance Day

episodes.synopsis: The trio tries gardening. / Our friends get the key from one of the surfers' cars. / A wave carries Anna off to the bottom of the ocean.
episodes.title: Operation Planktoculture / Operation Jeep Impact / Operation Plastic

episodes.synopsis: Filmmakers come to do a shoot on the beach. / Our plankton friends must sabotage a train. / The Threesome raids the garbage containers on the beach.
episodes.title: Operation Plankton Show / Operation Raid on the Kyoto Express / Operation Sorting Sabotage

episodes.synopsis: The commander is furious: a "cold spot" has escaped the commando's attention! / A fortress has been set up on the beach.
episodes.title: Operation Winkle Zone / Operation Cod-Tagion / Operation Hardshell
